headline: What to Know in Tech: iPhone Sales Deliver, AI Dominates
summary: While fear-mongering headlines and bearish calls dominated the early part of the year, the market's swift recovery, led by groundbreaking developments in AI, highlights the resilience and adaptability of the US economy.

headline: T-Mobile Is Moving Gopalan to CEO, Replacing Sievert
summary: T-Mobile will elevate its chief operating officer, Srini Gopalan, to the role of CEO on November 1, replacing Mike Sievert. Sievert, who will become vice chairman, says this is the right time to make a change. Gopalan and Sievert join "Bloomberg Tech" to discuss what comes next for T-Mobile and where they expect growth.

headline: T-Mobile names veteran Srini Gopalan as CEO to steer strategy amid fierce competition
summary: (Reuters) -T-Mobile said on Monday insider Srinivasan Gopalan would take over as CEO from Mike Sievert on November 1, marking a leadership transition as the telecom company works to defend its 5G lead in a saturated U.S. wireless market.  The industry has also witnessed significant consolidation in recent years, exemplified by T-Mobile's $26 billion merger with Sprint in 2020.  When asked about future M&A, Gopalan told Reuters that the company is now focused on investing in the spectrum and fiber business.

raw.headline: T-Mobile names veteran Srini Gopalan as CEO to steer strategy amid fierce competition
raw.summary: (Reuters) -T-Mobile said on Monday insider Srinivasan Gopalan would take over as CEO from Mike Sievert on November 1, marking a leadership transition as the telecom company works to defend its 5G lead in a saturated U.S. wireless market.  The industry has also witnessed significant consolidation in recent years, exemplified by T-Mobile's $26 billion merger with Sprint in 2020.  When asked about future M&A, Gopalan told Reuters that the company is now focused on investing in the spectrum and fiber business.

headline: T-Mobile Names Telecom Veteran as Next CEO
summary: T-Mobile US  named  Srini Gopalan,  its chief operating officer and a veteran of parent company  Deutsche Telekom  as its next chief executive.  Gopalan will take over Nov. 1 from CEO  Mike Sievert,  who has led T-Mobile since its 2020 merger with rival Sprint catapulted the business from a value brand into the country’s most valuable wireless carrier.  Gopalan, 55 years old, has handled much of the U.S. company’s day-to-day business since he became its operating chief in January.

raw.headline: T-Mobile Names Telecom Veteran as Next CEO
raw.summary: T-Mobile US  named  Srini Gopalan,  its chief operating officer and a veteran of parent company  Deutsche Telekom  as its next chief executive.  Gopalan will take over Nov. 1 from CEO  Mike Sievert,  who has led T-Mobile since its 2020 merger with rival Sprint catapulted the business from a value brand into the country’s most valuable wireless carrier.  Gopalan, 55 years old, has handled much of the U.S. company’s day-to-day business since he became its operating chief in January.

headline: Srini Gopalan to Succeed Mike Sievert as T-Mobile CEO on November 1, 2025
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., September 22, 2025--T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) today announced that it has named current Chief Operating Officer Srini Gopalan as T-Mobile’s next Chief Executive Officer, effective November 1, 2025. Gopalan will assume the role from Mike Sievert, who has been appointed to a newly created management position at T-Mobile, Vice Chairman.

raw.headline: Srini Gopalan to Succeed Mike Sievert as T-Mobile CEO on November 1, 2025
